alert.note: Alert for Chittenden; Franklin; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 9:08PM EDT until August 12 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... Northeastern Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... South central Franklin County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 908 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Westford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Waterville, Cambridge, Cambridge Village, Westford, Jeffersonville Village, Fairfax, Fletcher, Fairfield, Johnson, Essex, Underhill, Bakersfield, Belvidere, Jericho, Milton, Georgia, Jeffersonville, East Fletcher, Binghamville, and Belvidere Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
